name: success-writes/match-where-create-1
query:
MATCH (n:Person)-->(m:Person)
WHERE n.name = "Remy" AND m.name = "Adam"
CREATE (n)-[e:IS_FRIEND]->(m)
RETURN n;

expect.plan:
flowchart TD
    0["`
        __SCAN_NODES__
    `"]
    1["`
        __VAR__
        __name__: n
    `"]
    2["`
        __FILTER_NODE__
        __label__: Person
        __has predicate__
        __dep__ _n_._name_ (String)
    `"]
    3["`
        __GET_OUT_EDGES__
    `"]
    4["`
        __VAR__
        __name__: v0
    `"]
    5["`
        __FILTER_EDGE__
    `"]

    `"]

        __name__: m
    `"]
    8["`

        __label__: Person
        __has predicate__
        __dep__ _m_._name_ (String)
    `"]
    9["`

        __var__ n
        __prop__ name
    `"]
    10["`
        __GET_PROPERTY_WITH_NULL__
        __var__ m
        __prop__ name
    `"]
    11["`
        __WRITE__
        __edge__ (n)-[0:IS_FRIEND]->(m)
    `"]
    12["`

    `"]
